Text: BTW: Wanted to add, this does not fix the buggy GUI issue with the HP/Mana/End bars. Sorry, still working on the XML on that one. It is a communication error between the #mystats communication in the GUI and the info being transferred from the server. Makes for a difficult fix. Planning to mod a test server to try and fix it but I need to find the time. This last one took 3 months in the works.

Not trying to be a douche, but I am at an 8 ratio and still the only seed.

Please SEED people, help speed it up!

Obviously I am being throttled by Xfinity because they have some personal vendetta against TPB... Bastards! Checked speedtest.net and 56Mbps down and 18Mbps up, but only upping at average 34Kbps. 

Again... PLEASE, SEED - that is the only co$t for this.

Hmmmm I guess no one wants to keep this alive... at a 19.544 ratio and only one other seed on...

:(

SEED SEED SEED SEED SEED SEED -- or it dies.
Wow, at a 34 ratio and no comments? Can someone confirm that this is clean and works for me, so people don't think that it is some net garbage. Thanks.
